critique: This document is an executive order focused on improving energy efficiency and reducing greenhouse gas emissions within the federal government. It sets goals for agencies to reduce energy consumption, promote renewable energy, and conserve water. There is a strong emphasis on using life-cycle cost analysis to ensure cost-effectiveness. The order also establishes interagency coordination and encourages the use of Energy-Savings Performance Contracts and other financing mechanisms. It promotes sustainable building design and the use of energy-efficient products. The document reflects a commitment to environmental stewardship and fiscal responsibility within the federal government.
